backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, order creation and retrieval, and role‑based access control using authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI styling and admin order panel requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of core frontend components, sections, styles, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark palettes and core CSS resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with favicon and meta settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout wiring all site sections, auth sheet, cart provider, header/footer, and initialization hooks.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context and reducer managing cart state, item operations, subtotal, and item count.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items and state plus subtotal calculation helper.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.ts: Hook exposing cart context and enforcing provider usage.
frontend/src/components/AuthSheet.tsx: Bottom sheet UI for login/logout via Internet Identity with hero image, state handling, and auto‑close behavior.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: Shows a fixed alert banner when the backend is unreachable; stays hidden during initial checks or when connected.
frontend/src/components/CartSheet.tsx: Provides a slide-in cart panel with item controls, subtotal display, and checkout trigger, synced with global cart state.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutSheet.ts: Implements a checkout form with authentication handling, validation, address creation, and order submission via createOrder.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Renders a responsive image grid with hover zoom and optional title overlay.
frontend/src/components/menu/CategoryPil: Clickable category pill displaying a thumbnail and name with selected styling.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemCar: Menu item card showing image, description, price variants, and an add‑to‑cart action.
Displays a mobile-only bottom nav with quick scroll links, profile auth handling, and cart badge with open-cart event.
frontend/src/components/OpeningHoursBadg: Shows a compact hours badge by deriving a single-line summary from siteContent hours.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Prompts authenticated users missing a profile to enter info, capture location, validate fields, and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wraps content in a styled section with container and optional class overrides.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays footer with branding, quick navigation links, contact details, and optional WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation, auth handling, cart, checkout, and admin access logic.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Static site content including hero text, about info, contact details, and gallery data.
frontend/src/data/menu.ts: Typed menu data structures and full menu listing with categories, items, and price variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectivit: Hook that pings the backend for connectivity status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles and orders using an actor-based backend API with authentication checks and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserInitialization: Initializes authenticated users by triggering backend registration and invalidating related queries once per session.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, utility layers, and custom admin and mobile UI styles.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides a simple utility to format numbers as Pakistani Rupees.
frontend/src/lib/orderMapping.ts: Maps cart items and form fields into backend OrderItem and Address structures.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merging helper using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/sections/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the About section with story text, approach details, and a gallery.
frontend/src/sections/admin/AdminOrderCa: Shows a summary card for an order with status styling, totals, and a button to view details.
frontend/src/sections/admin/AdminOrderIt: Renders a list of order items in admin view, showing quantity, pricing, and totals per item.
frontend/src/sections/AdminOrdersSection: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and updating orders with role checks and detailed order dialogs.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Displays contact info and a validated contact form with simulated submission.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, logo, tagline, CTA button, and highlight cards.
frontend/src/sections/MenuSection.tsx: Renders the menu with category filters and item cards, letting users add items or variants to the cart.
frontend/src/sections/MyOrdersSection.ts: Displays the user’s order history with authentication checks, sorting, detailed status UI, and order detail dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/uiEvents.ts: Implements a simple event bus for emitting and subscribing to UI-only events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including session-backed storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, radii, animations, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Maintains project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests for the admin orders panel redesign.
